######
Thanks
######

Many thanks to `Andreas Heger`_ and CGAT_. The project follows CGAT approaches and tools.
The script pipeline_template.py is a simplified version of this template_.

For the full experience, including powerful and flexible reporting, please install `CGAT tools`_.

.. _`Andreas Heger`: https://github.com/AndreasHeger

.. _CGAT: http://www.cgat.org

.. _`CGAT tools`: https://github.com/CGATOxford

.. _template: https://github.com/CGATOxford/CGATPipelines/blob/master/CGATPipelines/pipeline_template_data/pipeline_template_full.py
